trans-unit.source: --------------------- Affected Systems List --------------------- This Errata Advisory may apply to the systems listed below. If you know that this errata does not apply to a system listed, it might be possible that the package profile for that server is out of date. In that case you should run 'up2date -p' (RHEL 4 and below) or 'rhn-profile-sync' (RHEL 5 and above) as root on the system in question to refresh your software profile.
trans-unit.target: --------------------- 受影响的系统列表 --------------------- 这个勘误建议可以应用到下面列表中的系统。如果您知道 这个勘误不适用于这些系统，这可能是因为 用于该服务器的软件包配置已经过期。此时您应该以根用户在这些系统里运行 'up2date -p' (RHEL 4 及更低版本) 或 'rhn-profile-sync' (RHEL 5 及更高版本) 来刷新软件配置。

trans-unit.source: Red Hat @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Server Certificate expiration warning
trans-unit.target: 红帽 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 服务器证书过期警告

trans-unit.source:
Dear @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ User,
This email is being sent to you to inform you that your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Certificate has expired on your local satellite {0}. After {1} day(s) the systems management services provided by your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Server will become inaccessible. Please contact your regional Red Hat Customer Service Representative for information on how to renew your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Certificate.
Thank you for using @@PRODUCT_NAME@@. --the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Team

context-group.name: ctx
context-group.context: {0} - Hostname of the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Whose Cert has Expired: highwind.devel.redhat.com {1} - Days Until satellite certificate expiration: 7

trans-unit.target:
尊敬的 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 用户，
这封邮件是通知您，您在本地 Satellite {0} 上的 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 证书 已经过期。在 {1} 天后，您将无法再访问 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 服务器提供的 系统管理服。 关于如何更新您的 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 证书， 请联系红帽客户服务的区域代表。
感谢您使用 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@。 --@@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 团队

trans-unit.source: Red Hat satellite certificate expiration notice
trans-unit.target: 红帽 satellite 证书过期通知

trans-unit.source:
Dear @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ User,
This email is being sent to you to inform you that your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Certificate has expired on your local satellite {0}. The system management services will be inaccessible until your certificate is renewed. Please contact your regional Red Hat Customer Service Representative for information on how to renew your @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Certificate.
Thank you for using @@PRODUCT_NAME@@. --the @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ Team

context-group.name: ctx

trans-unit.target:
尊敬的 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 用户，
这封电子邮件是为了通知您，您的 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 证书 在本地的 Satellite {0} 上已经过期。系统管理服务将不可访问， 直到您更新了证书。关于如何更新 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 证书， 请联系红帽客户服务的区域代表。
感谢您使用 @@PRODUCT_NAME@@。 --@@PRODUCT_NAME@@ 团队
